#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;

long long int digit(long long int n)
{
	long long int total_digits=9,no_of_digits=1,num,dig;
	long long int final_num,final_dig,k=0;
	
	while( n > 0) 
	{
		k++;
		n-= 9 * pow(10,k - 1) * k;
	}
	n+= 9 * pow(10,k - 1) * k;
	if(n%k==0)
	{
		final_num=(pow(10,k-1) -1 )+ n/k ;
		return final_num%10;
	}
	else
	{
		final_num=pow(10,k-1) + n/k;
		final_dig=final_num/pow(10,k-(n%k));
		return final_dig%10;		
	}
}
	
int main()
{
	long long int t,n,k,i;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n>>k;
		cout<<digit(k)<<endl;
	}
return 0;
}
